articles.description: Last year's controversial victor ran a rare course, straight from the winner's circle to pasture. On what should have been race week, SI asks: What the heck happened to Country House?
articles.content: When Larry Roth returned to his Long Island home last May, from Louisville, he unpacked a pair of muddy boots and declared he would never clean them again. He and his family had bought cheap ponchos and galoshes at a Walmart the night before the Kentucky Derb… [+17316 chars]
